A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ep. 8 is a miserable movie; it finished destroying Luke's character\, it provided no development for Rey at all\, it provided an unsatisfying end to Snoke without revealing the mystery\, it completely fails to explain why the First Order exists\, why its so powerful and what happened to the New Republic\, and due to their collective idiocy the Resistance is gone. There's no need to make another movie. The shark is jumped. Stop. Please let this be the Last movie about Jedi. If they Return from this\, it'll only make it worse.
